---
title: "Sponsors"
---

Sponsoring R-Ladies Ottawa is a great way to show your support for gender diversity in our community. You can support our local chapter with:

* Venue space
* Food and beverages
* Prizes for coding challenges
* Funding for any of the above

If you're interested in sponsoring us, please contact the organizers via a direct message on our [Meetup Group](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-ottawa/).
